name: Scary Wife 3D
description:
You wake up in your house but there is a girl here. She said she is your new wife. But you don't have a memories about your marriage with her. At first, it doesn't concern you because she is beautiful. But something is very strange about her, say hello to your new scary wife!

You have 5 days to escape from your house. Be careful if you meet your wife, she will attack you. And also you'll need to find at least 10 diary in wife's mansion about yourself because you have lost your memory. That is required to uncover her real identity. Is she a stranger, neighbour, teacher, robber or a granny in disguise?

You can also choose your neighbor wife appereance. Is it beautiful, cute, small, sexy waifu, or even old and scary granma. Run from horror mansion and have fun escaping!
